sentences.en: My grandma is old.
sentences.zh: 我的奶奶年纪大了。

sentences.en: This is an old book.
sentences.zh: 这是一本旧书。

sentences.en: The young girl likes to play in the park.
sentences.zh: 这个年轻的女孩喜欢在公园里玩。

sentences.en: My young brother is five years old.
sentences.zh: 我的弟弟五岁了。

sentences.en: The funny clown made everyone laugh.
sentences.zh: 这个滑稽的小丑让所有人都笑了。

sentences.en: She told a funny story about her cat.
sentences.zh: 她讲了一个关于她的猫的有趣故事。

sentences.en: What kind of book do you like?
sentences.zh: 你喜欢什么种类的书？

sentences.en: This is a kind of fruit.
sentences.zh: 这是一种水果。

sentences.en: The teacher has strict rules for the class.
sentences.zh: 老师对班级有严格的规定。

sentences.en: We must follow strict safety guidelines.
sentences.zh: 我们必须遵守严格的安全准则。

sentences.en: It is polite to say 'thank you' when someone helps you.
sentences.zh: 当有人帮助你时，说“谢谢”是有礼貌的。

sentences.en: Being polite to others can make communication more pleasant.
sentences.zh: 对他人有礼貌能让交流更愉快。

sentences.en: A hard-working student always finishes homework on time.
sentences.zh: 一个勤奋的学生总是按时完成作业。

sentences.en: Her hard-working attitude helps her achieve good grades.
sentences.zh: 她勤奋的态度帮助她取得了好成绩。

sentences.en: The clever boy solved the math problem quickly.
sentences.zh: 这个聪明的男孩很快解出了数学题。

sentences.en: She is clever at finding creative solutions.
sentences.zh: 她善于找到有创意的解决办法。

sentences.en: The shy girl hides behind her mother.
sentences.zh: 这个害羞的女孩躲在她妈妈后面。

sentences.en: He feels shy when speaking in public.
sentences.zh: 他在公共场合讲话时感到害羞。

sentences.en: I know your name.
sentences.zh: 我知道你的名字。

sentences.en: Do you know this story?
sentences.zh: 你知道这个故事吗？

sentences.en: This is our classroom.
sentences.zh: 这是我们的教室。

sentences.en: Our teacher is very kind.
sentences.zh: 我们的老师非常和蔼。

zh: （用于女子的姓氏或姓名前，不指明婚否）女士

sentences.en: Ms Wang is my English teacher.
sentences.zh: 王女士是我的英语老师。

sentences.en: I should greet Ms Smith politely.
sentences.zh: 我应该礼貌地问候史密斯女士。

sentences.en: I sometimes go to the park on weekends.
sentences.zh: 我有时周末去公园。

sentences.en: She sometimes reads books before bed.
sentences.zh: 她有时睡前看书。

sentences.en: A robot can help people do many things.
sentences.zh: 机器人能帮助人们做很多事情。

sentences.en: I want to build a smart robot in the future.
sentences.zh: 我将来想制造一个智能机器人。

sentences.en: I saw him playing basketball in the park.
sentences.zh: 我看到他在公园里打篮球。

sentences.en: She gave him a book as a birthday present.
sentences.zh: 她送给他一本书作为生日礼物。

zh: 会说；会讲（某种语言）；用（某种语言）说话

sentences.en: I can speak English.
sentences.zh: 我会说英语。

sentences.en: Please speak loudly.
sentences.zh: 请大声说话。

sentences.en: I need to finish my homework before dinner.
sentences.zh: 我需要在晚饭前完成作业。

sentences.en: She will finish reading the book tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 她明天将读完这本书。

sentences.en: Monday is the first day of the week in many countries.
sentences.zh: 在许多国家，星期一是一周的第一天。

sentences.en: I usually go to school on Monday.
sentences.zh: 我通常在星期一去上学。

sentences.en: Today is Tuesday.
sentences.zh: 今天是星期二。

sentences.en: We have math class on Tuesday.
sentences.zh: 我们星期二有数学课。

sentences.en: Wednesday comes after Tuesday and before Thursday.
sentences.zh: 星期三在星期二之后，星期四之前。

sentences.en: We have a math class on Wednesday morning.
sentences.zh: 我们星期三上午有一节数学课。

sentences.en: We often have PE class on Thursday.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在星期四上体育课。

sentences.en: Thursday is the fifth day of the week in some countries.
sentences.zh: 在一些国家，星期四是一周的第五天。

sentences.en: Friday is the sixth day of the week.
sentences.zh: 星期五是一周的第六天。

sentences.en: We often have a math test on Friday.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在星期五有数学测试。

sentences.en: Saturday is the seventh day of the week.
sentences.zh: 星期六是一周的第七天。

sentences.en: We often go shopping on Saturday.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在星期六去购物。

sentences.en: Sunday is the first day of the week.
sentences.zh: 星期日是一周的第一天。

sentences.en: I often go to the park with my family on Sunday.
sentences.zh: 我经常在星期日和家人一起去公园。

sentences.en: I like to play games on the weekend.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在周末玩游戏。

sentences.en: We usually go shopping at the weekend.
sentences.zh: 我们通常在周末去购物。

sentences.en: I need to wash my hands before eating.
sentences.zh: 吃饭前我需要洗手。

sentences.en: She helps her mom wash the dishes after dinner.
sentences.zh: 晚饭后她帮妈妈洗碗。

sentences.en: I need to wash my clothes today.
sentences.zh: 我今天需要洗我的衣服。

sentences.en: She helps me wash my clothes every weekend.
sentences.zh: 她每个周末帮我洗我的衣服。

sentences.en: I wear a watch on my wrist.
sentences.zh: 我手腕上戴着一块手表。

sentences.en: This watch tells me the time.
sentences.zh: 这块手表告诉我时间。

sentences.en: I like to watch TV in the evening.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在晚上看电视。

sentences.en: She often watches TV after finishing her homework.
sentences.zh: 她经常在完成作业后看电视。

sentences.en: I can do my homework.
sentences.zh: 我能做我的家庭作业。

sentences.en: We do exercises every day.
sentences.zh: 我们每天做练习。

sentences.en: I need to do homework after school.
sentences.zh: 放学后我需要做家庭作业。

sentences.en: Doing homework helps me learn better.
sentences.zh: 做家庭作业帮助我更好地学习。

sentences.en: I like to read books every day.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢每天读书。

sentences.en: Can you read this English story?
sentences.zh: 你能读这个英语故事吗？

sentences.en: I like to read books in the library.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在图书馆看书。

sentences.en: Reading books can help us learn new things.
sentences.zh: 读书能帮助我们学习新东西。

sentences.en: We like to play games in the park.
sentences.zh: 我们喜欢在公园里玩游戏。

sentences.en: She can play the piano very well.
sentences.zh: 她钢琴弹得很好。

sentences.en: I like to play football with my friends.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢和朋友们一起踢足球。

sentences.en: We often play football in the park on weekends.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在周末去公园踢足球。

sentences.en: I enjoy cooking delicious meals for my family.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢为家人做美味的饭菜。

sentences.en: Cooking requires practice and patience to improve skills.
sentences.zh: 烹饪需要练习和耐心来提高技能。

sentences.en: She often goes to the park on weekends.
sentences.zh: 她经常在周末去公园。

sentences.en: He often reads books before going to bed.
sentences.zh: 他经常在睡觉前看书。

sentences.en: We often play in the park on weekends.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在周末去公园玩。

sentences.en: The park is a good place to relax.
sentences.zh: 公园是放松的好地方。

syllables: tired 是单音节词，其音节划分应为：tired

sentences.en: I feel tired after running.
sentences.zh: 跑步后我感到累。

sentences.en: She looks tired because she stayed up late.
sentences.zh: 她看起来很累，因为她熬夜了。

sentences.en: I like to play sport every day.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢每天做运动。

sentences.en: Playing sport is good for our health.
sentences.zh: 做运动对我们的健康有好处。

sentences.en: I like to play sports every morning.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢每天早上做运动。

sentences.en: Playing sports helps us stay healthy and strong.
sentences.zh: 做运动帮助我们保持健康和强壮。

sentences.en: You should finish your homework on time.
sentences.zh: 你应该按时完成作业。

sentences.en: We should help each other.
sentences.zh: 我们应该互相帮助。

sentences.en: Every day I go to school.
sentences.zh: 我每天去上学。

sentences.en: Every student should study hard.
sentences.zh: 每个学生都应该努力学习。

sentences.en: What day is it today?
sentences.zh: 今天星期几？

sentences.en: I go to school every day.
sentences.zh: 我每天去上学。

sentences.en: I need to check my schedule before going out.
sentences.zh: 出门前我需要查看我的日程安排。

sentences.en: The teacher posted the exam schedule on the noticeboard.
sentences.zh: 老师把考试日程表贴在了布告栏上。

sentences.en: I ate a delicious sandwich for lunch.
sentences.zh: 我午餐吃了一个美味的三明治。

sentences.en: Can you make a sandwich with ham and cheese?
sentences.zh: 你能用火腿和奶酪做一个三明治吗？

sentences.en: I like to eat a fresh salad for lunch.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢午餐吃一份新鲜的沙拉。

sentences.en: She adds vegetables and dressing to her salad.
sentences.zh: 她给她的沙拉加了蔬菜和调味酱。

sentences.en: I like to eat a hamburger for lunch.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢午餐吃一个汉堡。

sentences.en: He bought a hamburger from the fast food restaurant.
sentences.zh: 他从快餐店买了一个汉堡。

sentences.en: I like to eat ice cream in summer.
sentences.zh: 夏天我喜欢吃冰淇淋。

sentences.en: She bought a vanilla ice cream from the store.
sentences.zh: 她从商店买了一个香草冰淇淋。

sentences.en: I like to drink tea in the morning.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在早上喝茶。

sentences.en: My mother makes delicious tea for guests.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈为客人泡美味的茶。

sentences.en: The fresh bread smells good.
sentences.zh: 新鲜的面包闻起来很香。

sentences.en: She likes to eat fresh fruits.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢吃新鲜的水果。

sentences.en: Eating fruits and vegetables helps keep us healthy.
sentences.zh: 吃水果和蔬菜有助于保持我们健康。

sentences.en: Doing exercise every day is important for a healthy life.
sentences.zh: 每天锻炼对健康的生活很重要。

sentences.en: The cake is delicious.
sentences.zh: 这个蛋糕很美味。

sentences.en: She cooked a delicious meal for us.
sentences.zh: 她为我们做了一顿美味的饭。

sentences.en: The sun is hot in summer.
sentences.zh: 夏天的太阳很热。

sentences.en: Hot coffee can warm me up.
sentences.zh: 热咖啡能让我暖和起来。

sentences.en: The cake tastes very sweet.
sentences.zh: 这个蛋糕尝起来很甜。

sentences.en: She likes sweet fruits like strawberries.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢像草莓这样的甜水果。

sentences.en: I like to drink milk in the morning.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在早上喝牛奶。

sentences.en: She needs to drink more water every day.
sentences.zh: 她每天需要多喝水。

sentences.en: I feel thirsty after playing basketball.
sentences.zh: 打篮球后我感到口渴。

sentences.en: She drinks water because she is thirsty.
sentences.zh: 她喝水是因为她口渴。

sentences.en: My favourite color is blue.
sentences.zh: 我最喜欢的颜色是蓝色。

sentences.en: Reading books is her favourite hobby.
sentences.zh: 读书是她最喜欢的爱好。

sentences.en: I like to eat healthy food every day.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢每天吃健康的食物。

sentences.en: Fruit and vegetables are good kinds of food.
sentences.zh: 水果和蔬菜是很好的食物种类。

zh: （用于信函抬头的名字或头衔前）亲爱的

sentences.en: Dear friends, let's study English together.
sentences.zh: 亲爱的朋友们，让我们一起学习英语。

sentences.en: She wrote a dear letter to her parents.
sentences.zh: 她给父母写了一封亲切的信。

sentences.en: An onion has a strong smell and makes people cry when cut.
sentences.zh: 洋葱有强烈的气味，切开时会让人流泪。

sentences.en: I added some chopped onion to the soup for extra flavor.
sentences.zh: 我往汤里加了一些切碎的洋葱来增加风味。

sentences.en: I like to sing songs.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢唱歌。

sentences.en: She can sing very well.
sentences.zh: 她唱歌唱得很好。

sentences.en: I like to sing a song.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢唱一首歌。

sentences.en: This is a beautiful song.
sentences.zh: 这是一首美丽的歌。

sentences.en: I like to sing English songs in my free time.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在空闲时间唱英文歌。

sentences.en: She often teaches her friends to sing English songs.
sentences.zh: 她经常教她的朋友们唱英文歌。

sentences.en: She likes to play the pipa in her free time.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢在空闲时间弹琵琶。

sentences.en: My music teacher can play the pipa very well.
sentences.zh: 我的音乐老师琵琶弹得很好。

sentences.en: Kung fu is a traditional Chinese martial art that emphasizes both physical skill and mental discipline.
sentences.zh: 功夫是中国传统武术，强调身体技巧和心智纪律。

sentences.en: Many people practice kung fu to improve their health and learn self-defense.
sentences.zh: 许多人练习功夫以增进健康和学习自卫。

sentences.en: I like to do kung fu every morning.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢每天早上练功夫。

sentences.en: He can do kung fu very well.
sentences.zh: 他功夫打得很好。

sentences.en: She loves to dance in the park every evening.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢每天晚上在公园里跳舞。

sentences.en: We will dance together at the party tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我们明天将在派对上一起跳舞。

sentences.en: I like to draw pictures.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢画画。

sentences.en: Can you draw a cat for me?
sentences.zh: 你能为我画一只猫吗？

sentences.en: I like watching cartoon movies.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢看卡通电影。

sentences.en: The cartoon has colorful characters.
sentences.zh: 这部卡通有色彩鲜艳的角色。

sentences.en: She likes to draw cartoons in her free time.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢在空闲时间画卡通画。

sentences.en: The teacher asked us to draw cartoons of animals.
sentences.zh: 老师让我们画动物的卡通画。

sentences.en: My mom likes to cook delicious meals for our family.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈喜欢为我们家做美味的饭菜。

sentences.en: Can you teach me how to cook scrambled eggs?
sentences.zh: 你能教我怎么做炒鸡蛋吗？

sentences.en: I like to swim in the pool.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在游泳池里游泳。

sentences.en: She can swim very fast.
sentences.zh: 她能游得很快。

sentences.en: I often play basketball with my friends after school.
sentences.zh: 放学后我经常和朋友们一起打篮球。

sentences.en: Playing basketball is a good way to keep healthy and strong.
sentences.zh: 打篮球是保持健康和强壮的好方法。

sentences.en: We often play ping-pong after school.
sentences.zh: 我们经常放学后打乒乓球。

sentences.en: Ping-pong is a popular sport around the world.
sentences.zh: 乒乓球是一项在全世界流行的运动。

sentences.en: I like to play ping-pong with my friends.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢和我的朋友们打乒乓球。

sentences.en: We often play ping-pong after school.
sentences.zh: 我们经常放学后打乒乓球。

sentences.en: We need to speak English in class.
sentences.zh: 我们需要在课堂上说英语。

sentences.en: My teacher asks me to speak English every day.
sentences.zh: 我的老师要求我每天说英语。

sentences.en: we'll go to the park tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我们明天要去公园。

sentences.en: I think we'll finish the work on time.
sentences.zh: 我认为我们会按时完成工作。

zh: 下一个的；紧接着的；接下来的

sentences.en: What is the next step in the process?
sentences.zh: 这个过程的下一步是什么？

sentences.en: The next bus will arrive in ten minutes.
sentences.zh: 下一班公交车将在十分钟后到达。

sentences.en: The sunset over the ocean is wonderful.
sentences.zh: 海上的日落非常美妙。

sentences.en: She gave a wonderful performance at the concert.
sentences.zh: 她在音乐会上的表演很精彩。

sentences.en: I want to learn English.
sentences.zh: 我想要学习英语。

sentences.en: We learn new things every day.
sentences.zh: 我们每天都学习新东西。

sentences.en: I can do any task.
sentences.zh: 我可以做任何任务。

sentences.en: Any book is good for reading.
sentences.zh: 任何书都适合阅读。

sentences.en: We need to solve the problem step by step.
sentences.zh: 我们需要一步步解决这个问题。

sentences.en: The teacher explained how to approach the problem clearly.
sentences.zh: 老师清晰地解释了如何处理这个问题。

sentences.en: A: Can you help me? B: No problem.
sentences.zh: A：你能帮我吗？B：没问题。

sentences.en: Thank you for your help! No problem at all.
sentences.zh: 谢谢你的帮助！一点也不麻烦。

sentences.en: I want to eat an apple.
sentences.zh: 我想吃一个苹果。

sentences.en: She wants to go to the park.
sentences.zh: 她想去公园。

sentences.en: I need to send a letter to my friend.
sentences.zh: 我需要给我的朋友寄一封信。

sentences.en: Can you help me send this package?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我寄这个包裹吗？

sentences.en: I sent an email to my teacher yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我昨天给我的老师发了一封电子邮件。

sentences.en: Please check your email for the new information.
sentences.zh: 请查看你的电子邮件获取新信息。

sentences.en: I am good at swimming.
sentences.zh: 我擅长游泳。

sentences.en: We will meet at the park.
sentences.zh: 我们将在公园见面。

sentences.en: The clock on the wall shows the time.
sentences.zh: 墙上的钟显示着时间。

sentences.en: I use a clock to know when to go to school.
sentences.zh: 我用钟来知道什么时候上学。

sentences.en: We plant trees in spring.
sentences.zh: 我们在春天种树。

sentences.en: This plant needs a lot of sunlight.
sentences.zh: 这种植物需要大量阳光。

sentences.en: I drink water from my water bottle.
sentences.zh: 我用我的水瓶喝水。

sentences.en: The water bottle is on the desk.
sentences.zh: 水瓶在桌子上。

sentences.en: I ride a bike to school every day.
sentences.zh: 我每天骑自行车去上学。

sentences.en: My bike is red and blue.
sentences.zh: 我的自行车是红蓝相间的。

sentences.en: I took a photo of the beautiful sunset.
sentences.zh: 我拍了一张美丽日落的照片。

sentences.en: She shows me her favorite photo.
sentences.zh: 她给我看了她最喜欢的照片。

sentences.en: The front of the house has a big window.
sentences.zh: 房子的前面有一扇大窗户。

sentences.en: Please write your name on the front page.
sentences.zh: 请在首页写上你的名字。

sentences.en: The cat sits in front of the door.
sentences.zh: 猫坐在门前面。

sentences.en: There is a big tree in front of the house.
sentences.zh: 房子前面有一棵大树。

phrases.zh: 你我之间；天知地知你知我知

sentences.en: The cat is sitting between the two chairs.
sentences.zh: 猫正坐在两把椅子之间。

sentences.en: We will have a meeting between 2 pm and 4 pm.
sentences.zh: 我们将在下午2点到4点之间开会。

sentences.en: The bird is flying above the tree.
sentences.zh: 那只鸟在树上方飞。

sentences.en: Please write your name above the line.
sentences.zh: 请把你的名字写在线的上方。

sentences.en: The cat is sitting beside the dog.
sentences.zh: 猫正坐在狗的旁边。

sentences.en: She placed her bag beside the chair.
sentences.zh: 她把包放在椅子旁边。

sentences.en: The cat is hiding behind the door.
sentences.zh: 猫藏在门后面。

sentences.en: She walked behind me quietly.
sentences.zh: 她悄悄地走在我后面。

sentences.en: The book is over there.
sentences.zh: 书在那边。

sentences.en: She is standing there.
sentences.zh: 她正站在那里。

zh: 祖父；祖母；外祖父；外祖母

sentences.en: My grandparent tells me stories every night.
sentences.zh: 我的祖父母每晚给我讲故事。

sentences.en: I visit my grandparent on weekends.
sentences.zh: 我周末去看望我的祖父母。

sentences.en: They lost their keys yesterday.
sentences.zh: 他们昨天丢了他们的钥匙。

sentences.en: The children are playing with their toys.
sentences.zh: 孩子们正在玩他们的玩具。

sentences.en: This is a beautiful house.
sentences.zh: 这是一座漂亮的房子。

sentences.en: I live in a red house.
sentences.zh: 我住在一座红色的房子里。

sentences.en: We need to lot the data points on the graph.
sentences.zh: 我们需要在图表上标注这些数据点。

sentences.en: She used a pencil to lot the positions of the stars.
sentences.zh: 她用铅笔标注了星星的位置。

sentences.en: There are lots of books on the shelf.
sentences.zh: 书架上有很多书。

sentences.en: She has lots of friends in school.
sentences.zh: 她在学校有很多朋友。

sentences.en: A flower blooms in the garden.
sentences.zh: 一朵花在花园里绽放。

sentences.en: She likes to smell the flower.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢闻这朵花。

sentences.en: I need to move the chair to the corner.
sentences.zh: 我需要把椅子搬到角落。

sentences.en: Cats can move quickly when they see a mouse.
sentences.zh: 猫看到老鼠时能快速移动。

sentences.en: The floor is dirty and needs to be cleaned.
sentences.zh: 地板很脏，需要打扫一下。

sentences.en: Don't touch the dirty water with your hands.
sentences.zh: 不要用手碰脏水。

sentences.en: Flowers can be seen everywhere in the garden.
sentences.zh: 花园里到处都能看到花。

sentences.en: People use mobile phones everywhere now.
sentences.zh: 现在人们到处都使用手机。

sentences.en: The mouse is small and likes cheese.
sentences.zh: 这只老鼠很小，喜欢奶酪。

sentences.en: I use a mouse to click on the computer.
sentences.zh: 我用鼠标点击电脑。

sentences.en: They are watching a live concert.
sentences.zh: 他们正在观看一场现场音乐会。

sentences.en: The football match will be broadcast live.
sentences.zh: 这场足球比赛将进行现场直播。

sentences.en: We should protect nature and live in harmony with it.
sentences.zh: 我们应该保护自然并与它和谐共处。

sentences.en: Nature provides us with fresh air, clean water and beautiful scenery.
sentences.zh: 大自然为我们提供新鲜的空气、干净的水和美丽的景色。

sentences.en: A forest is a large area covered with trees.
sentences.zh: 森林是一大片长满树木的区域。

sentences.en: We can see many animals living in the forest.
sentences.zh: 我们可以看到许多动物生活在森林里。

sentences.en: The river flows gently through the village.
sentences.zh: 这条河轻轻地流过村庄。

sentences.en: We often play by the river on weekends.
sentences.zh: 我们周末经常在河边玩。

sentences.en: We can swim in the lake.
sentences.zh: 我们可以在湖里游泳。

sentences.en: The lake is blue and clear.
sentences.zh: 这个湖又蓝又清澈。

sentences.en: We climbed a high mountain yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我们昨天爬了一座高山。

sentences.en: The mountain is covered with green trees.
sentences.zh: 这座山被绿树覆盖着。

sentences.en: We climbed a high hill yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我们昨天爬了一座高山。

sentences.en: The sun sets behind the green hill.
sentences.zh: 太阳落在绿色的小山后面。

sentences.en: A tree has green leaves.
sentences.zh: 树有绿色的叶子。

sentences.en: Birds sing in the tree.
sentences.zh: 鸟儿在树上唱歌。

sentences.en: We cross the river by bridge.
sentences.zh: 我们通过桥过河。

sentences.en: The bridge connects two cities.
sentences.zh: 这座桥连接着两座城市。

sentences.en: The building is very tall.
sentences.zh: 这座建筑物非常高。

sentences.en: We live near a big building.
sentences.zh: 我们住在一座大建筑物附近。

sentences.en: I live in a red house.
sentences.zh: 我住在一栋红色的房子里。

sentences.en: The house has a big garden.
sentences.zh: 这栋房子有一个大花园。

sentences.en: We enjoy boating on the lake every weekend.
sentences.zh: 我们每个周末都喜欢在湖上划船。

sentences.en: Boating is a popular activity in summer.
sentences.zh: 划船是夏天很受欢迎的活动。

sentences.en: We like to go boating on the lake.
sentences.zh: 我们喜欢在湖上划船。

sentences.en: She wants to go boating with her friends.
sentences.zh: 她想和朋友们一起去划船。

sentences.en: You aren't happy.
sentences.zh: 你不开心。

sentences.en: They aren't coming.
sentences.zh: 他们不来了。

sentences.en: A rabbit has long ears and likes to eat carrots.
sentences.zh: 兔子有长长的耳朵，喜欢吃胡萝卜。

sentences.en: The little rabbit jumps happily in the grass.
sentences.zh: 小兔子在草地上快乐地跳着。

sentences.en: The kite flies high in the sky.
sentences.zh: 风筝在天空中飞得很高。

sentences.en: He jumped high to catch the ball.
sentences.zh: 他跳得很高去接球。
